name: mcq-qiuz-web
description: AptiArena is an AI-powered quiz hosting platform for education, events, and competitions. It allows anyone to create, host, and participate in quizzes with real-time features.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
